destiny.core

Class PGif

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.core.PGif

  • public class PGif
extends Object
    This class uses the OpenImaging GifDecoder to make a gif that is drawable to a PApplet
    Version:
    12/5/2020
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PGif(int x, int y, String pathName)
      Creates a gif at the given from the given path

      • PGif

        public PGif(int x,
            int y,
            String pathName)
        Creates a gif at the given from the given path
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left of the gif
        y - The y coordinate of the top left of the gif
        pathName - The path to the gif

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet window)
        Draws the gif to the given window
        Parameters:
        window - The PApplet that the gif should be drawn to
        Postcondition:
        The PApplet will have a gif drawn to it

      • translate

        public void translate(int xShift,
                      int yShift)
        Shifts the top left corner of the gif by the specified amount
        Parameters:
        xShift - The amount you want to shift along the x axis. Positive is to the right
        yShift - The amount you want to shift along the y axis. Positive is down
